title: Enemy team remake consider as a loss game during series
body: Hey Riot members, I have a serious issue I wanted to discuss about today. During my series, I was given three games for my promotion. In the very first game of my series, the enemy team decided to remake because one of their player were afk. However, after I quit the game screen and return back to the cilent, it have shown that I received an X for one of my three games. I find this confusing because I didn't lose in that game since it was a remake. I am very concerned of this issue, so can you please find any solution in this situation please. Thank you.

replies.body: Ahhhh yea sometimes those promo series can be a little confusing. After looking over your League history, it looks like you happened to dodge a queue when your miniseries first started. Keep in mind, any [**queue dodges in promo or miniseries will be marked as a loss**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h2q2).

I Up voted just because of your English :D
Perfect
